DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore combination vinorelbine gemcitabine well vinorelbine carboplatin treatment advance non-small cell lung cancer , term survival , quality life need palliative radiotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Vinorelbine/Gemcitabine Versus Vinorelbine/Carboplatin Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Nonsmall cell lung cancer stage IIIB IV Not eligible radical radiotherapy surgery WHO performance status 02 Pregnancy Other clinical active cancer disease ALAT/ALP 3 time upper normal limit , bilirubin > 1.5 upper limit Bowel disease cause malabsorption
